Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_Dan
Text.Desc: A recipe book for concocting the elixirs kept secret by the Wudang Nimbus Sect.
Text.EffectDesc: Acquire the following elixir recipes:\nQi Fasting Pill\nTrimerous Essence Pill

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_Fabao1
Text.Desc: A precious book for crafting the Perfected Warrior Emperor's sword, a manual kept secret by the Wudang.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifact:\nPerfected Warrior Sword[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_Fabao2
Text.Desc: A precious book for crafting the Legacy Artifact of the sect, a manual kept secret by the Wudang.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire the crafting method of Legacy Artifact:\nPurple Cloud Measure[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_1
Text.Desc: Visualize the scene of ascending clear Qi. Improves Mental State and Qi Absorption Efficiency, but destabilizes foundation and decreases Max Qi and Qi Sense.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Mental State.
Increases efficiency of Qi Absorption.
Decreases Qi Sense.
Decreases Max Qi.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_2
Text.Desc: Visualize the scene of condensing unclean Qi. Improves foundation, increases Max Qi and Qi Sense, but affects Mental State and decreases Qi Absorption Efficiency.
Text.EffectDesc:
[size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Qi Sense.
Increases Max Qi.
Decreases Mental State.
Decreases Qi Absorption Efficiency.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_3
Text.Desc: Visualize a landscape of clear and unclean Qi. Changes talent, significantly increases Potential, Five Attributes and Inner Cauldron Limit.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Five Attributes by 30%.\nSignificantly increases Potential.\nSignificantly increases Inner Cauldron Limit.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_4
Text.Desc: Adjust primeval Qi in Middle Dantian and transform it into invisible flames to burn impurities around. Significantly increases Cultivation Speed, but decreases Artifact Mastery and Spell Abilities.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Cultivation Speed.\nDecreases Artifact Mastery Skill by 5 levels.\nDecreases Spell Skill by 5 levels.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_5
Text.Desc: Observe the way of the heavens and carry out divine wishes. Practice with this book to manipulate the killing intents between heaven and earth for battles. Increases Artifact Mastery and Spell Abilities, but decreases Cultivation Speed.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Mastery Skill by 5 levels.\nIncreases Spell Skill by 5 levels.\nSignificantly decreases Cultivation Speed.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_6
Text.Desc: Absorb fire of Yang and expel Yin energy, with the body as the primordial universe. Practice with this book to adjust Yin and Yang and slightly break through the skill limits of Artifact Mastery and Spell.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Comprehend the true meaning of Artifact Mastery, break through its limit by 3 levels.\nComprehend the true meaning of Spell, and break through its limit by 3 levels.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_7
Text.Desc: Refine the body with pure Yang power into a body of ultimate Yang. Increases Battle Skill to its limit, but also removes one's perception of art, making one irritated and significantly decreasing Mental State.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Battle Skill by 20 levels.\nDecreases Artisanry Skill by 20 levels.\nSignificantly decreases Mental State.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_8
Text.Desc: Refine the body with pure Yin power into a body of profound Yin. Increases Artisanry Skill to its limit, significantly improves Mental State, but also makes one extremely tired of battles.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artisanry Skill by 20 levels.\nSignificantly improves Mental State.\nDecreases Battle Skill by 20 levels.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_9
Text.Desc: Smelt Yin and Yang powers together and refine the Duality Immortal Body. Significantly increase Qi Sense and break through the skill limit of Protection.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Qi Sense.\nComprehend the true meaning of Protection, break through the skill limit of Protection by 3 levels.

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_10
Text.Desc: Mold two Primordial Nimbus Spirits with the Law of Nimbus Conquest. The Primordial Nimbus Spirits use swords and cast spells the same time as the cultivator does.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Acquire Primordial Nimbus Spirits.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_11
Text.Desc: Take in the air of heavens with a special breathing method. Practice it to increase Max Qi, but also make primeval Qi dissipate and significantly decrease Lifespan.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Max Qi.\nSignificantly decreases Lifespan.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_12
Text.Desc: Control the Qi flow and transform the body into its primeval state. Practice the method to significantly increase Lifespan, but also condense primeval Qi and decreases Max Qi.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Decreases Max Qi.\nSignificantly increases Lifespan.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_13
Text.Desc: Comprehend the secrets inside and outside the body. Practice the method to gain protection and increase Damage Reduction of the Five Elements.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Damage Reduction of the Five Elements.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_14
Text.Desc: Congeal pure Yang energy within the body to fundamentally increase Max Qi, but also significantly decrease Mental State.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Fundamentally increases Max Qi.\nSignificantly decreases Mental State.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_15
Text.Desc: Cleanse one's heart with Lunar Breath to significantly improve Mental State, but fundamentally decrease Max Qi.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly improves Mental State.\nFundamentally decreases Max Qi.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_16
Text.Desc: Motion and stillness, strength and softness, rise and fall, they are interchangeable. The chant speaks of the interchangeable nature of all creations. Practice it to significantly decrease Attainment.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly decreases Attainment.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_17
Text.Desc: Condense all that's ingenious into one. Practice this method to improve Compatibility with all Laws.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Improves Compatibility with all Laws.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_18
Text.Desc: Meditate on the void and keep silent. Practice this method to significantly increase Artifact Power, but decrease Artifact Qi Cap.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Power.\nDecreases Artifact Qi Cap.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_19
Text.Desc: A method of artifact mastery that contains enormous power. Practice it to significantly increase Artifact Qi, but decrease Artifact Power.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Qi.\nDecreases Artifact Power.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_20
Text.Desc: A sword style that focuses on the rudimentary aspects. Increases Artifact Qi Recovery Multiplier and makes one break through the skill limit of Artifact Mastery.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Artifact Qi Recovery Multiplier.\nComprehend the true meaning of Artifact Mastery, and break through its limit by 3 levels.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_21
Text.Desc: Wield the sword with Yin and Yang powers to increase the number of Artifacts one can control, but decrease Spell Primordial Soul since the mind is completely focused on the sword.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases number of Artifacts by 2.\nDecreases Spell Primordial Soul by 2.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_22
Text.Desc: Cast spells with Yin and Yang powers to increase the number of Spell Primordial Souls, but decrease the number of Artifacts one can control since the mind is completely focused on spells.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Spell Primordial Soul by 2.\nDecreases number of Artifacts by 2.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_23
Text.Desc: Follow the rule of Yin and Yang in practice to hugely increase Learning Speed and Cultivation Speed.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]massively increase learning speed\nmassively increase practice speed[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_24
Text.Desc: Observe the cycle of life and death repeatedly. Practice this method to significantly increase Spell Power, but also increase Spell Cost.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Increases Spell Power.\nIncreases Spell Cost.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_25
Text.Desc: Expel distractions and concentrate. Practice this method to significantly decrease Spell Cost, but also decrease Spell Power.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Decreases Spell Power.\nDecreases Spell Cost.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_26
Text.Desc: Make sure to merge your body and spirit. Practice this method to fundamentally increase Spell Power and break through the skill limit of Spell.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Spell Power.\nComprehend the true meaning of Spell, break through its limit by 3 levels.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_27
Text.Desc: It's said to be the method of evasion left behind by the Perfected Warrior Emperor when he ascended, only six steps to go anywhere you want. Practice it to increase Move Speed but draw people's attention since it's showy and dashing.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Move Speed.\nSignificantly decreases Stealth.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_28
Text.Desc: A unique method that makes the form blend in with the air. Practice this method to significantly decrease Move Speed, but hide one's presence from others.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly decreases Move Speed.\nSignificantly increases Stealth.[/color][/size]

Text.Name: Gong13_Esoterica_29
Text.Desc: A method of evasion that makes one ride wind with Yin and Yang energies and reach the destination in an instant.
Text.EffectDesc: [size=10][color=#D06508]Significantly increases Flying Speed in adventures.[/color][/size]
